definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: A Good Winter Brings a Good Summ.
Sorching midsummer, choosing a few trendy sunglass is first selection important matter.
sentences.chinese: 炎炎盛夏，選幾款新潮的太陽鏡是首選大事。

sentences.english: Nothing beats a fresh beer in the middle of summer.
sentences.chinese: 盛夏時節再沒有比一杯新鮮啤酒更好的東西了。

sentences.english: This should be hot in the summer, now why can let a person feel so cool?
sentences.chinese: 本應酷熱的盛夏，此刻爲何會讓人感覺如此的微涼？

sentences.english: There's nothing like a Popsicle on a hot summer afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在盛夏午後來支冰棒是最好不過了。

sentences.english: This summer, August has not yet come.
Because the sun is higher during summer, the hot summer sunlight appears yellow.
sentences.chinese: 因爲夏季的太陽高一些，盛夏的陽光顯得黃。

sentences.english: Children long for cool, refreshing water in the summer heat almost as much as plants do.
sentences.chinese: 孩子在盛夏的時候就像植物一樣喜歡涼爽，新鮮的水。

sentences.english: Beauty is as summer fruits, which are easy to corrupt, and cannot last;
sentences.chinese: 美猶如盛夏的水果，是容易腐爛而難保持的。

sentences.english: At the moment, singing cicadas also fell in a tree to rest while singing in summer passion.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，鳴蟬也伏在樹上一邊休息一邊放歌盛夏的激情。

sentences.english: It was midsummer and very hot.
sentences.chinese: 時逢盛夏，天氣異常炎熱。

sentences.english: They can also make cool and refreshing ice cream, popsicles and red bean soup.
sentences.chinese: 每逢盛夏，可用紅小豆製成雪糕，冰棒，冰淇淋。

sentences.english: Your beauty is just blinding me. Like sunbeams on a summer stream.
sentences.chinese: 伱的美麗像盛夏的光束一般一點點刺瞎峨。

sentences.english: Flower fade and fruit of summer fade.
sentences.chinese: 花會凋謝，盛夏的果實會枯萎。

sentences.english: The summer heat withered up certain plants.
sentences.chinese: 盛夏炎熱使某些植物萎縮了。

sentences.english: He spatters cold water on the floor to cool the room in hot summer.
sentences.chinese: 盛夏時節，他把水涼灑在地板上降溫。

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
